recommended_degree: Kimia Industri, PJJ Teknik Industri, Teknik Kimia Polimer, Teknologi Industri Cetak kemasan, Perancangan Manufaktur (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1.Familiar with ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 22000, HACCP, GMP, and other quality standards. 
2.Familiarity with quality inspection tools, testing equipment, and reporting procedures. 
3.Ability to follow standard operating procedures (SOPs) and quality checklists. 
4.Experience in data entry, quality reports, and basic statistical analysis. 
5.A strong commitment to reducing plastic waste and promoting eco-friendly solutions. 
6.Attention to detail to ensure product quality and compliance. 
7.Strong problem-solving and analytical thinking. 
8.Willingness to work in shifts or production areas
